about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hello! I'm a Frontend Developer passionate about web development with Angular and modern technologies. I love creating interactive, optimized interfaces with a great user experience.
My focus is on minimalist design with smooth animations and clean code.

countryApp.description: This project provides information through an HTTP request about its code and the number of inhabitants of a country based on entering its name, capital, or region, as selected. This information can be modified to display more desired data.

dynamicList.description: Using components, it allows adding two fields: Name and Strength of a 'Superhero' with a Dragon Ball theme. Additionally, a button is enabled to remove the row itself.

gifsApp.description: App that shows the top trending gifs by default. You can search for any gif through the built-in search engine.
